As a retired high school science teacher , I would like to commend Edgar Allen Beem for bringing attention to the urgency of the climate crisis , and for pointing out that the overwhelming consensus among climate scientists is that the crisis is man - made ( The Universal Notebook : Unusual weather we 're having , is n't it ? )
